subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which king ruled over Rajasthan during the late medieval period?
question_hi: राजस्थान के लालकां ने लंबे मध्यभागी परिवर्तन के दौरान राजस्थान पर बाजार किया?
explanation_en: Prithviraj Chauhan (प्रतिष्ठ चौध्रांत) was a famous Rajput king who ruled Rajasthan during the late medieval period.
explanation_hi: Prithviraj Chauhan (प्रतिष्ठ चौध्रांत) was a renowned Rajput king who governed Rajasthan in the later medieval period.
